name: Test Generation
description: Generate comprehensive test suites for existing code

variables.name: sourceFile
variables.description: Source file to generate tests for

steps.name: Code Analysis
steps.prompt: Analyze {{sourceFile}} and identify all functions, methods, and edge cases that need testing.

steps.name: Generate Tests
steps.prompt: Generate comprehensive tests for {{sourceFile}} using {{testFramework}}. Target {{coverageTarget}}% coverage. Include unit tests, integration tests, and edge cases.

steps.name: Review Tests
steps.prompt: Review the generated tests for quality and completeness.
